name: Oxanium
description: Oxanium is a square, futuristic font family. It feels at home on the head-up display of a spaceship, or the scoreboard of a video game. Its intuitive strokes ensure legibility at small sizes and quick glances, while angled cuts add charisma to big headlines. To contribute, please go to github.com/sevmeyer/oxanium .
author: Severin Meyer
